OrgName.entry: THE VENUE STOCKSBRIDGE - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: A community space and performing arts hub that has a variety of spaces available for hire, these include: The main auditorium, a large multi purpose concert hall and stage which can accommodate up to 300 people; function suite with accoustic soundboards and a variety of meeting rooms and activity spaces of varying size. The premises also have a large bar and catering facilities available.
